html:
{%- from "templates/print_formats/standard_macros.html" import add_header, render_field -%}
{{ letter_head}}
{% if not no_letterhead and footer %}
{{ footer }}
{% endif %}

{{ _("Page {0} of {1}").format('', '') }}

{{ doc.doctype }}

Name of Work: {{ doc.branch }} Name of Contractor: {{ doc.party }}
Award letter No.: {{ frappe.db.get_value("Project", doc.project, 'referenceno') }} Contract Amount: {{ frappe.format_value(frappe.db.get_value("Project", doc.project, 'project_value'), {"fieldtype":"Currency"}) }}
Duration of Completion: {{ frappe.utils.formatdate(doc.creation) }} Date of Completion: {{ frappe.utils.formatdate(frappe.db.get_value("Project", doc.project, 'expected_end_date')) }}
Title: {{ doc.name}}
{%- for row in doc.boq_item -%} {%- if row.boq_code -%} {% else %} {%- endif -%} {%- if row.is_group == 1 -%} {% else %} {%- endif -%} {%- if row.is_group == 1 -%} {% else %} {%- endif -%} {%- if row.is_group == 1 -%} {% else %} {%- endif -%} {%- endfor -%}
BOQ Code Description of items UOM QTY Rate Amount Remarks
{{ row.boq_code }}{{ row.item }} {{ row.uom }}{{ row.quantity }}{{ frappe.format_value(row.rate, {"fieldtype":"Currency"})}}{{ frappe.format_value(row.amount, {"fieldtype":"Currency" })}} {{ row.remarks }}
Total: {{ frappe.format_value(doc.total_amount, {"fieldtype":"Currency"}) }}
This print is system generated and should be considered VALID only with appropriate seal and/or signature.
Printed by {{ frappe.user }} on {{ frappe.utils.nowdate() }} at {{ frappe.utils.nowtime() }}
{% if footer and not no_letterhead %}
{{ footer }}
{% endif %}
name: BOQ Addition
